title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: API Step
description: Definition of an API endpoint for creating pets

title: Module Imports
description: Import required functions from the store module

title: Request Validation
description: Validate incoming request data to ensure it meets the expected format and constraints.

title: Data Processing
description: Process the validated data and create a new pet record in the store.

title: Emits
description: We can define the events that this step will emit, this is how we can trigger other Motia Steps.

title: Workflow Integration
description: This step triggers background jobs by emitting events that other steps subscribe to

title: Handler
description: The handler is the function that will be executed when the step is triggered. This one receives the request and creates a new pet.

title: Logger
description: The logger is a utility that allows you to log messages. It is available in the handler function and automatically ties to the trace id of the request.

title: HTTP Response
description: The handler returns a response to the client with the created pet data and appropriate status code.
